Summary: it was glowing red and it had small white lights on top of it
trends: There have been no other sightings in pasig
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at home and was planning to smoke a cigarette on my terrace when i noticed a big red glowing thing in the sky right on top of the house of my neighbor. i thought it was a plane but it was round and glowing and had no sound,then thought it's a flare until i noticed that it had small white lights on top of it and it was flying steady across the sky to my house's direction.I had to go back inside to get my phone to call my sister who lives right beside me to see it too,but i called out her name instead of taking my eyes of it by dialing her number.she came out and saw it too. it flew straight,and i lost sight of it when it went past my house,the roof of my house covered my sight where it headed to.
